cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid enum value will cause security configuration errors and prevent proper ciphering setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting prach_dtx_threshold to a negative value will cause PRACH detection threshold errors and disrupt uplink synchronization.
du.explanation_zh: 將 prach_dtx_threshold 設定為負值將導致 PRACH 檢測閾值錯誤，並干擾上行鏈路同步。
